name: Naughty Frog
description:
You are a prince turned frog, and you want to recover your human form. To make it worse, you are trapped in a pit. You have to eat your way up; by eating the shattered (unusable) platforms you can restore them in your tummy to later spit them repaired. Furthermore, whenever you eat a piece of platform you get the ability to use your super fart, which gives you a dash in any direction. The game starts at the bottom of the pit, and it ends when you get out of it.

Extract and Run "Frog Knight" to play!
